title: Pk
discription: An alien's view of the world challenges people's long-held notions, making friends of some, and foes of others.

title: Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega
discription: Desperate for money, three men (Saif Ali Khan, Fardeen Khan) plot to kidnap a woman (Sonali Bendre) and hold her for ransom.

title: Punjab Nahi Jaungi
discription: A rom-com movie about Fawad and his quest to win the love of Amal at all costs despite belonging to two different worlds.

title: Jawani Phir Nahi Ani
discription: Will things get out of control when a single divorce lawyer takes his three married friends for a party vacation to Bangkok?

title: Jawani Phir Nahi Ani 2
discription: The boys are back, but this time the party is in Turkey. Enjoy this blockbuster movie full of humor, romance and twists.
